core_principles: Precision over Decoration: Data is the hero.
Grid is God: Everything aligns perfectly.
High Contrast: Black ink on white paper metaphor.
Density with Breathability: Tight tables, spacious wrappers.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-600 or darker on white backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, table rows).
accessibility.aria: Use aria-label for icon-only buttons. Use role='grid' for financial tables.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all Headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data.
Create a 'Layout' component that includes a Sidebar (collapsible) and a Topbar.
For the 'Spreadsheet' views (Trial Balance, Schedules), use a high-density table layout.
Do NOT use Cards for the main data entry grid. Use a clean, bordered table.
Use the 'auth_background' image for the Login/Signup page side panel.
Implement 'Sonner' for all toast notifications (Success: green border, Error: red border).
Ensure all financial numbers are right-aligned and use 'tabular-nums'.
Strictly follow the 'Swiss Ledger' color palette. No gradients on buttons.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a 'data-testid' attribute.
